data.text: @eva_patriot @SenAshleyMoody @LeaderJohnThune Hard NO to this act, stop giving children father’s last name, avoid the problems this act brings. Child support based on DNA not last names. Women will not be SILENCED!

@AnalogPatriotX @SenAshleyMoody @LeaderJohnThune Hard NO to this act, no longer giving children father’s last name to avoid the problems this act brings, child support based on DNA not last names. WOMEN WILL NEVER BE SILENCED!

@Fievel131 @SenAshleyMoody Hard NO to the save act, no longer give children father’s last name to avoid problems this act brings, child support is based on DNA not last names. They will not silence WOMEN!

@LindaofWestport @SenAshleyMoody Hard No to the save act, will no longer give children father’s last name to avoid the problems this act brings. Child support is based on DNA not last names. @PattyMurray @SpeakerJohnson

@SenAshleyMoody Already didn’t give children their father’s last name, that will stop some of your desire to punish women, DNA testing enables child support not last names @maziehirono @SenMikeLee @PattyMurray @SenGillibrand @SenAshleyMoody
@SenAshleyMoody @dmills3710 "Return to tradition" just means rerun old scripts. Debate? Try honest research first, not performative slogans pushed by politicians chasing engagement
@Broda_web4 @SenAshleyMoody This is strictly to stop women from voting!
@SenAshleyMoody How do you go along with punishment for women taking their husband’s name with this act? Hard NO to this act!
